objectSelector.title: What would you like to register?

downloadPage.title: Downloaded map groups
downloadPage.holdOverText: Hover over the links to preview the map tiles
downloadPage.largeGroup: This download group is using a lot of storage. can cause performance issues

data.cachedDataContent: Imported objects and background-maps will be deleted
data.imageImportContent: If there is poor reception after importing object, you may have chosen not to import images. When the device gets good reception the images can be loaded afterwards.

help.tipsContent: Suggestions-boxes that describes how to use the app are automatically turned on.

importedPage.dbToolTip: You can import registrations located in the database and get them displayed in the map.
importedPage.localToolTip: You can import SOSI files that you have downloaded and stored on your device.

objectPage.dbToolTip: You can import registrations located in the database and get them displayed in the map.
objectPage.hasUnPublished: Some objects were not published in the previous session. If you want to publish these you have to try again.
objectPage.localToolTip: You can import SOSI files that you have downloaded and stored on your device.

table.selectUnPublished: Only show objects that are not published

mapPage.editedUnpublished: Imported objects that have been edited but not published
mapPage.importYear: Imported objects with update date from this year
mapPage.newEditedPublished: New or edited objects that have been published
mapPage.newUnpublished: New object that have not been published

toolTip.registration: Start registration of a new object
toolTip.downloadMap: Download map layers that are currently on screen

importObjects.includeImagesContent: If you have poor reception, it may be an advantage not to include photos in the import. When the reception improves, they are downloaded automatically.
importObjects.infoText: You can import registrations located in the database and get them displayed in the map.
importObjects.objectChoosenText: objects within the selected area will be added to the map.

toolTip.geometry: Edit geometry for the chosen object
toolTip.properties: Edit properties for the chosen object
toolTip.moveLayerBack: Move the selected layer to back

toolTip.deleteRedraw: Remove object and start drawing again

dialog.title: Do you really want to delete this object?
dialog.alert: Important! All relevant object data including accessibility properties will be deleted!

demoDescription: Activate to transform the application into sandbox-mode. If active all changes will be temporary and limited to local storage.
